task.title: Step 2 - Generate Code
task.shortdesc: Analytics has a place to store your data for this website. When Step 1 is completed, you can obtain the code that is going to be implemented on your page.

step.cmd: Go to Admin > Admin Console > Code Manager.
Under Select the Type of Code to Generate selectJavaScript.
Select the newly created report suite.
Select the Character-Encoding of your website.

info.p: It is usually near the top of your HTML code. If you are unsure, use UTF-8.

step.cmd: Select the number of periods in your domain name.
Click Generate Code. Read the warning message, then click OK.

info.p: The resulting page contains two parts of code: Page Code and Core Javascript File. Keep this page open, as it is referenced several times.
